name: costume creation
description:
we do it all... any kind of costume you want.  from body-hugging lycra to plastic armor to victorian gowns!

we send you a measurements sheet with instructions.  we'll even meet with you for fittings in the southern arizona area.

we don't skip a detail... even the zippers are thought out for ease of putting on, taking off, and even a bathroom break!

price depends on difficulty of design.  contact us to discuss.

name: costume repair and enhancement
description:
your costume in need of some repairs?  perhaps you want to just spruce it up a bit wih some new upgrades?

we can repair or enhance any costume, and even most accessories.

price depends on difficulty.  contact us to discuss.

name: vinyl boots
description:
boots just below the knee, zipper inside.  yellow, silver, black, blue and red.  no half sizes.  

ask if used is available for lower price.  

click on the contact link to see if we have your size and color.

name: accessories
description:
every costume needs an accessory or two or three...

from hand made jewelry to masks to capes to cuffs to wigs, you ask and we can likely make it.

price depends on difficulty.  contact us to discuss.

name: plush character
description:
does your art need a huggable character to help bring it to life?  of course!

we can make stuffed animals, plush characters, dolls, etc. all to add marketing.

price depends on difficulty of design.  contact us to discuss.
